entry.def: Basal means relating to or forming the base of something.

example.ex: Side shoots should be cut back to one leaf above the basal cluster.
example.tran: 应将旁枝剪至主串上一叶高处

entry.tran: 基本的；处于休息状态的
entry.def: Your basal metabolic rate is the rate at which your body uses energy when it is at rest.

example.ex: Regular exercise can increase your basal metabolic rate...
example.tran: 定期运动能够提高你的基础代谢率。

example.ex: Basal metabolism is much lower for creatures in cold water.
example.tran: 冷水中生物的基础代谢速度要低很多。

means.word_mean: 1. especially of leaves; located at the base of a plant or stem; especially arising directly from the root or rootstock or a root-like stem;
2. serving as or forming a base;

sentences.sentence: "the painter applied a base coat followed by two finishing coats"
